name: Shrimp Scampi
description: A savory dish of sauteed shrimp served over linguine in our house-made scampi sauce.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: An Italian classic! A thin, garlic crust topped with our homemade tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil.

name: Meat Lovers Pizza
description: Our most savory pizza! Loaded with pepperoni, sausage, ham, and bacon.

name: Chicken Parmigiana
description: A staple of Italian cuisine! Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese. Served over spaghetti.

name: Greek Pizza
description: A Greek inspired pizza, topped with spinach, roasted peppers, and feta cheese. Red or white base.
